programme.title: コワくない。就活 就活応援ニュースゼミ（2）[字]
programme.desc: どこを探しても答えが見つからない…そんな就活生のギモンを、就活のプロや人事担当者に直接ぶつけるシリーズ第2回！「コネ採用や早期採用など、別枠って存在する？」.(n)

programme.title: 有吉のお金発見 突撃！カネオくん▽定番のレジ横菓子！ひと粒チョコのお金の秘密[字][再]
programme.desc: ふだん聞けないお金の秘密をカネオくんが可視化で解明！時代をこえて愛される、ひと粒チョコ！ピンチを乗り越えた数々のアイデアと商品開発の裏側にももクロ百田も興奮！.(n)

programme.title: プロフェッショナル▽立ち止まるな、種はいつか実る〜野菜バイヤー・小堀夏佳〜[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 全国の農家から絶大な信頼を寄せられる野菜バイヤー。「安納芋」など大ヒットを連発。去年冬、挑んだ新種の野菜1トンの販売。しかし、産地に大雪が。そのとき下した決断！.(n)

programme.title: 世界はほしいモノにあふれてる「ベトナム縦断！美しき手仕事を探す旅」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 南から北へ、ベトナムの魅力を伝える縦断旅！繊細な手仕事に魅せられた人々に密着。世界中にファンを持つ「幻の陶器」、少数民族の貴重な品々も登場。注目の世界遺産も。.(n)

programme.title: スポーツ×ヒューマン「自由に 何にも縛られずに ブレイキン・半井重幸」[字]
programme.desc: その男は誰よりも“自由”。パリ五輪の新競技「ブレイキン」、半井重幸18歳。個性と個性のぶつけ合い。だからこそ負けるわけにはいかない。世界最高峰といわれる大会へ。.(n)

programme.title: 沖縄 慶良間諸島 ※一部地域は放送休止
programme.desc: 〜沖縄県・慶良間諸島〜.(n)

programme.title: 瀬戸内 ふるさとの絶景 ※一部地域は放送休止
programme.desc: 穏やかな海と無数の島々が美しい風景を織りなす瀬戸内海。空や海の「青」。渓谷の「緑」。夕日が染める「赤」。四季折々に変化する瀬戸内の「色」をつづる映像詩。.(n)

programme.title: 大相撲（2021年） 幕内の全取組「春場所 二日目」
明日へ1min． 僕に、私に、できること Vol．2「根岸えまさん」
programme.desc: 被災地のために“できること”を伝えるシリーズ▽東京出身・根岸えまさん▽カッコイイ大人に魅了され気仙沼に移住▽まちづくりの支援から見つけた「関わりしろ」とは？.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「赤い自転車」「かいじん百面相」
programme.desc: 「赤い自転車」うた：花花／「かいじん百面相」うた：石丸幹二.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」[字][再]
programme.desc: 「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」菅野 拓（京都経済短期大学 講師）.(n)

programme.title: 時論公論「来月から“70歳就業法” 生涯現役社会の働き方は？」[再]
programme.desc: 来月から、社員が70歳まで働けるよう全企業に努力義務が課される。65歳までは雇用の義務があるが、65歳を超えると委託など非雇用も可能。働き方や待遇はどう変わる？.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本 ワクチン 菅首相も接種へ
programme.desc: ▼“島の暮らしを守りたい” 新人猟師の挑戦 ▼りんご並みの糖度！？ 伝統の豆腐をもう一度.(n)

programme.desc: ▼“自宅で最期を迎えたい” 若年がん患者を支援 ▼注目！生産者応援のカタログギフト.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本 ワクチン 菅首相も接種へ[字]
programme.desc: ▼派遣社員のテレワーク 認められずトラブルも ▼“店貸します” さまざまな業種で広がりが ▼福島第一原発 ヘリ放水の裏で….(n)

programme.desc: ▽コロナ禍で「哲学」を歩きながら語り合う 【キャスター】高瀬耕造，桑子真帆，【気象キャスター】檜山靖洋.(n)

programme.title: 【連続テレビ小説】おちょやん（72）「うちは幸せになんで」[解][字]
programme.desc: 千代（杉咲花）につきまとうテルヲ（トータス松本）。冷徹に無視し続ける千代。周囲は困惑しながらも、ただならぬ空気を察する。テルヲは一平（成田凌）にある勝負を挑む….(n)

programme.title: あさイチ「クイズとくもり 甘くてシャキシャキ！“新たまねぎ”活用術」[字][双]
programme.desc: 甘さとみずみずしさを生かしたレシピが続々▽丸ごとレンチン！芯までトロトロ▽コクがすごい！Wたまねぎカレー▽血液サラサラ！焼きアボカド新たまサラダ▽選び方＆保存術.(n)

programme.desc: ▽総務省の接待問題などをめぐって質疑 ▽NTTと東北新社の社長が参考人として委員会に出席 ▽接待の実態や行政手続きへの影響の有無めぐり与野党が質疑.(n)

programme.title: もふもふモフモフ「吉田鋼太郎、大西流星、藤原大祐 おうち時間大公開」[解][字]
programme.desc: 鋼太郎＆流星＆大祐が愛するペットとのラブラブ生活を自撮り。心も体も傷ついた盲目の保護犬は、新たな飼い主さんと家族になれるのか。堤真一が案内する究極の癒やし番組。.(n)

programme.title: うたコン「春 大切な人へ贈る歌」[字]
programme.desc: 【出演】明日海りお，岡千秋，丘みどり，オール巨人，海援隊，DA PUMP，ももいろクローバーZ，山内惠介，押尾コータロー，フラッシュ金子ほか.(n)

programme.desc: 【キャスター】林田理沙.(n)

programme.desc: これさえ見れば、きょう1日の首都圏のニュース、あすの気象情報がわかる。.(n)

programme.title: ニュースウオッチ9▽中国への対応は日米外相防衛閣僚協議▽変異株の監視強化へ[二][字]
programme.desc: ▽日米の外相・防衛相中国への対応など協議▽変異株の監視強化へ検査体制は▽コロナ禍コールセンターは今….(n)

programme.title: クローズアップ現代＋▽地銀・改革の最前線 従来の常識は通用せずコロナ禍の今こそ[字]
programme.desc: ネット金融大手が求める「今まで通りではダメ」その意味は▽地域経済を支えられるのか？融資からの脱却どこまで？▽ライバルとの提携で変革突きつけられる銀行員.(n)

programme.title: プロフェッショナル「一節入魂、己を込める〜鰹（かつお）節職人・瀬崎祐介〜」[解][字]
programme.desc: キロ3万3千円史上最高額の値が付いたかつお節の作り手、瀬崎祐介（40）その節は宝石のような輝きを放つ。節に込めた男の矜持（きょうじ）若き求道者の迷いと成長の物語.(n)

programme.title: ニュースきょう一日[字]
programme.desc: きょう一日がわかる、おやすみ前の15分。仕事や家事で忙しかったあなたに。ポイントをわかりやすく。あしたにつながる、ささやかだけど役に立つ情報をまとめてお届け。.(n)

programme.title: 時論公論「ワクチン接種1か月 副反応をどう考える」[字]
programme.desc: 新型コロナのワクチン接種が始まって1か月。アナフィラキシーの疑いの報告が海外より多いのではとの声も聞かれる一方、国は重大な懸念は認められないという。どう考える？.(n)

programme.title: 未来スイッチ「歩道での“自転車の危ない”なくしたい」[字]
programme.desc: 歩道を歩いて、走ってくる自転車とぶつかりそうになってヒヤッとした、そんな経験は？事故をなくすため、全国で始まっている取り組みについてお伝えする。.(n)

programme.title: NHKスペシャル「大震災と子どもたちの10年 いま言葉にできること」[字][再]
programme.desc: 1800人に上る震災遺児。彼らはいま、身近な家族だからこそ語れぬ思いがあることを明かした。悲しみの温度差や期待への違和感、新しい家族への気遣い。10年間の記録。.(n)

programme.title: 【ドラマ10】ドリームチーム [終]（8）「信じて走れ！」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 香菜（山口紗弥加）のアプリ事業に融資のチャンス到来！そんな中、前夫・圭吾（前川泰之）も登場！安藤（伊武雅刀）失踪の謎も解き明かされる、大波乱の最終回！！！.(n)

programme.title: 金曜日のソロたちへ▽緊急時のソロたちへ…電気ガス水道スマホが使えなくなった時[字][再]
programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年。「ひとり暮らしの防災」をテーマに緊急時のソロたちの対応を4画面で観察！ソロウオッチャー：井上裕介、能町みね子、河北麻友子.(n)

programme.title: 空からクルージング特別編「ヨーロッパの城と宮殿」 ※一部地域は放送休止

programme.title: 映像詩「やまとの季節七十二候」 ※一部地域は放送休止

programme.desc: 英語で話しかけられた時、とっさに応対できますか？ 簡単な英語で「即レス」できるよう、スタジオの出演者が画面の前のあなたを徹底的にコーチします！.(n)

programme.title: 趣味の園芸「輝きのリーフプランツ 金銀銅」[字]
programme.desc: 花がなくてもリーフプランツで華やかに！リシマキアなど金色の葉で明るく。シロタエギクなどシルバープランツでハイセンスに。コルジリネなど銅葉でぐっと引き締める。.(n)

programme.title: みんなでエール×沼にハマってきいてみた 吹奏楽沼（5）[字]
programme.desc: 「沼にハマってきいてみた」と「みんなでエール」のコラボ企画。全国6つの高校の吹奏楽部が、リモート演奏リレーに挑戦！ 全国の吹部にエールを贈る！その第5弾！.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 親と子のメンタルケア（2）「幼児期前半（2〜3歳ころ）編」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理 手仕事12か月「つくだ煮」[字]
programme.desc: 今月の手仕事は、江戸時代から続く保存食「つくだ煮」。日本料理店店主の林亮平さんが、応用のきく「つくだ煮の方程式」をもとに、春らしく家庭的なレシピを紹介します！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「しっとりおいしく そぼろ弁当」[字]
programme.desc: 新しい生活の準備を始める3月。ビギナーにピッタリのお弁当を提案します。定番のそぼろのつくり方をご紹介。ご飯やおかずの詰め方など、弁当作りの基本もお伝えします。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ シェフの休日（6）天野順子（スパイシーフード＆カレー店シェフ）[解][字]
programme.desc: 味でも見た目でも、私たちを魅了するプロの料理人たち。多忙な彼らの休日、自身や家族、仲間のために作る料理とは？そこにはどんな技が？人気シェフの暮らしのレシピ満載！.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン おうちでカフェ風 “映える”いちごレシピ6「いちごの生菓子」[字]
programme.desc: 旬を迎えたいちご。いちご菓子店店主でいちご研究家の渡部美佳さんに、バリエーション豊かな「いちごを味わい尽くレシピ」を教えてもらう。第6回はプリンなどの生菓子。.(n)

programme.title: 先人たちの底力 知恵泉「江藤新平 次の時代をデザインするには？」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 近代日本の司法制度を形作った江藤新平。江戸幕府の政治制度を徹底的に研究し三権分立など明治新政府の新しい国家デザインを次々に発案。江藤の先進性に田原総一朗が迫る。.(n)

programme.title: ボキャブライダー on TV「貫禄」

programme.title: みちのくモノがたり「未来への架け橋〜福島 和菓子〜」[字]

programme.title: みんなのうた「おおブレネリ」「山口さんちのツトム君」

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース[手]
programme.desc: 【キャスター】小野寺善子.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV シリーズ東日本大震災10年2▽誰もが助かる地域をめざして[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 災害が起きたとき、障害者や高齢者の命をどうすれば守れるのか。水害から住民の命を守った地域の取り組みや、「福祉と防災の連携」に取り組む自治体の例から考える。.(n)

programme.desc: 不眠特集、きょうは子どもの睡眠障害。新型コロナウイルス感染拡大以降、子どもたちの眠りの質が悪化している。夜型化にスマホの影響。安眠を得るポイントを紹介する。.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「つながりつづける力〜コロナと居場所〜」[字]
programme.desc: 「つながりつづける力〜コロナと居場所〜」湯浅誠（NPO法人「全国こども食堂支援センター・むすびえ」理事長）.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 科学と人間生活「動物にとっての光の役割」[字]
programme.desc: 科学技術の発展は、どのようなところに生かされているのだろう？ 私たちの身の回りにある自然や道具を糸口に、科学の世界を楽しく解き明かしていく。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 総合的な探究の時間「あなたは将来どのような仕事を ありす」[字]
programme.desc: 「総合的な探究の時間」とはいかなる学習か？を、番組独自の学習モデル、学習ノウハウと、現役高校生の探究学習の実践を通して学べるNHK高校講座です。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 日本史「鉄砲の伝来」[字]
programme.desc: 「歴カフェ」へようこそ！ここは歴史好きな人たちが集い各時代について語り合う茶屋です。日本はどんな歴史を歩んできたのか。日本史について知る楽しさを、さぁご一緒に！.(n)

programme.title: NHK短歌 題「眼鏡」[字]
programme.desc: 選者は小島なおさん。ゲストはパンサーの菅良太郎さん。題は眼鏡。菅良太郎さんのエピソードをもとに、小島なお、星野真里、カン・ハンナの三人が短歌を競詠する。.(n)

programme.title: 楽ラクワンポイント介護「認知症（14）あれっ？と思う人を見かけたら」[字]
programme.desc: 認知症の家族の介護についてアドバイスする。今回は「あれっ？と思う人を見かけたら」。講師は認知症ケアの第一人者の介護福祉士・和田行男さん。.(n)

programme.title: そして「みんなのうた」は生まれた〜60年を彩った名曲秘話「北風小僧の寒太郎」[字]

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ ニャッキ！「鳥カゴ」

programme.title: しぜんとあそぼ「てんとうむし」

programme.title: コレナンデ商会「回転寿司」[字][デ]

programme.desc: 味でも見た目でも、私たちを魅了するプロの料理人たち。多忙な彼らの休日、自身や家族、仲間のために作る料理とは？そこにはどんな技が？人気シェフの暮らしのレシピ満載！.(n)

programme.title: ノージーのひらめき工房ミニ「たのチーミー！」ほか[字]
programme.desc: キミの創作ゴコロをくすぐる5分ミニ番組！ひらめき満載の工作、役に立つ工作ソング、視聴者の作品紹介、プロの技を拝見するコーナーなど、盛りだくさんでおとどけします。.(n)

programme.title: ゴー！ゴー！キッチン戦隊クックルン「アユVSダークアユ」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 3人の小学生がキッチン戦隊クックルンに変身！料理のおいしさパワーで悪とたたかう▽自分のダークサイドと戦うアユ。一人でキッチンへ！作る料理は、「ロールキャベツ」。.(n)

programme.title: オトッペ「びしゃばしゃビーチサイド」
programme.desc: 音から生まれた不思議な生きもの・オトッペと世界一のDJを目指すシーナの大冒険。.(n)

programme.title: アニメ おじゃる丸「みんなのたまえ先生」[字]
programme.desc: 千年前のヘイアンチョウから月光町にやってきたおじゃる丸が、小学生のカズマや町の人々、あとを追ってきた子鬼（おに）たちとゆかいな騒動（そうどう）をまきおこします。.(n)

programme.title: アニメ 忍たま乱太郎「本奉行の正体の段」[字]
programme.desc: 乱太郎・きり丸・しんべヱは、忍術学園で学ぶ忍者のたまご「忍たま」。ユニークな先生や仲間たちと、明るく・たのしく・ゆかいな毎日がくり広げられる。.(n)

programme.title: 天才てれびくんhello， ▽最年長てれび戦士からの最後のメッセージ
programme.desc: てれび戦士最年長のイクとユラが大道芸に挑戦！2人に与えられた練習期間はわずか1週間。身につけた技を最後、後輩戦士たちの前で披露（ひろう）するというが…！.(n)

programme.title: アニメねこねこ日本史（天てれアニメ）▽悪人とは呼ばないで、戦国武将・松永久秀！[再]
programme.desc: もしもあの偉人が猫だったら？みんなが知っている歴史上の人物が猫になって登場。自由気ままな猫たちによるほのぼの歴史コメディー。ゆる〜く歴史が学べる（かもしれない）.(n)

programme.title: 沼にハマってきいてみた「部屋を美部屋に！ 新年度を気持ちよくスタート！」[字]
programme.desc: もうすぐ新年度。部屋をきれいにして気持ちよくスタートしたいアナタ必見。スッキリ片づける方法やかわいく彩るテク紹介。ゲストのアインシュタインが部屋を自撮りで公開！.(n)

programme.title: アニメ ログ・ホライズン 円卓崩壊（10）「アキバの迷宮」[字]
programme.desc: オンラインゲームの世界に閉じ込められた若者たちの冒険と絆の物語「ログ・ホライズン」におよそ6年ぶりのシリーズ最新作が登場！アキバの街をあらたな危機が襲う！.(n)

programme.title: びじゅチューン！「見返りすぎてほぼドリル」
programme.desc: 浮世絵「見返り美人図」がテーマ。主人公の女性がちらちらと振り返るうちにぐるぐると回るのではないかと発想。ドリルになったり風を起こしたりと役に立つ様子を歌った。.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 災害時に役立つ防災メニュー（3）「乾物」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV ＃隣のアライさん「これだけは知ってほしい！セクマイカップル」[字]
programme.desc: さまざまなマイノリティーのアライ＝味方になりたい！同性婚訴訟で関心が高まるセクマイカップル。認知が広がる一方で「本音の壁」にモヤモヤも…心からの尊重とは？.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 痛風だけじゃない！こわい高尿酸血症「命にも関わる病気」[解][字]
programme.desc: 痛風だけでなく、命に関わる病気を引き起こすおそれもある、高尿酸血症。実は男性だけでなく、女性や子どもにも少なくないことが明らかに。健康診断で尿酸値のチェックを！.(n)

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース845[手]
programme.desc: きょう一日の国内外の主な出来事や最新のニュースを手話と映像でコンパクトにお伝えします。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理 ゆーママ“ラク盛り”レシピ▽組み合わせ自由！カラフルお弁当おかず[字]
programme.desc: ラクな料理で、見栄えもよし！ゆーママこと松本有美さんならではの、頑張らなくてもすてきに見える料理のワザを伝授。今回は1品5分以内でできるカラフルなお弁当おかず。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「彩りよく さけのチーズのっけ焼き弁当」[字]
programme.desc: 塩ざけにひと味加えてこんがり焼きます。栄養も彩りもバランスの良いお弁当です。※詰める順番はご飯、大きなおかず、副菜は最後に。がコツです。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ 筆ペンイラスト（7）「人物を描く 夢二・黒船屋」[解][字]
programme.desc: 筆ペンでイラストを描いてみませんか？繊細な線も力強い線も思いのままの筆ペンなら、味のあるイラストが簡単に。第7回は人物に挑戦。竹久夢二の黒船屋を描く。.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン 不器用さんでも大丈夫！はじめてのミシン（3）「カーブを縫う」[字]
programme.desc: コロナの巣ごもり需要でミシンが大ブーム。しかし、入手してみたが難しくて諦めてしまったという人が多いのでは。超初心者のためにミシンの基本を伝える。.(n)

programme.title: 又吉直樹のヘウレーカ！ 最終回シリーズ「ボクも100歳まで生きられますか？」[解][字]
programme.desc: 残すところ放送あと2回。今回は「長生き」を考える。40代に突入した又吉は切に願うようになったが、果たして医学的に可能なのか？長生きで本当に幸せになれそう？.(n)

programme.title: no art，no life「澤井玲衣子」
programme.desc: 今まで見たことのない芸術に圧倒される5分間。各地のアーティストを取材、作品が生まれる過程を記録する。うとうとまどろみながら絵を描く澤井玲衣子を紹介。.(n)

programme.title: ねほりんぱほりん選 「震災で家族が行方不明の人」知られざる思いを抱えて[解][字]
programme.desc: 顔出しNGの人から赤裸々な話を聞き出すトーク番組を子ども番組伝統の人形劇で見せるスタジオショー。今回はアンコール「震災で家族が行方不明の人」。.(n)

programme.title: もっと伝わる！即レス英会話 Lesson（95）
programme.desc: 英語で話しかけられた時、とっさに応対できますか？ 簡単な英語で「即レス」できるよう、スタジオの出演者が画面の前のあなたを徹底的にコーチします！.(n)

programme.title: テレビでハングル講座（41）「総復習（3）」
programme.desc: 「心結ぶ会話術〜『聞く』『伝える』『深める』を磨こう！」 目指すのは、交流を深め“友だちになる”ための言葉の習得。1年間の学習で基礎をしっかり身につけます。.(n)

programme.title: Eテレ2355 水曜日
programme.desc: きょうの終わりにほっとひといき。『2355』は、見ると気持ちよくリラックスできる、おやすみ前にぴったりの5分番組です.(n)

programme.desc: 震災と原発事故から10年。避難生活の影響などで亡くなった「震災関連死」が福島では2320人。一度助かった命を何が奪ったのか。独自に入手した資料をもとに検証する。.(n)

programme.title: 旅するためのドイツ語（23）「ドイツ最大の港町・ハンブルク」
programme.desc: いつかドイツを楽しく旅行するために、ドイツをはじめドイツ語圏の風景、伝統、食など文化を映像で味わいながら、旅先で必要になる厳選キーフレーズを覚えていく！.(n)

programme.title: キャラとおたまじゃくし島（10）「おんさがいい感じ…でもって太鼓がコワイ感じ」[字]
programme.desc: まっすぐで愛にあふれた少女戦士キャラが、不思議なガッキアニマルたちと出会い心を通わせる中で、音楽を奪われた島の謎を次々と解き明かす冒険ファンタジー第10話。.(n)

programme.title: テレビで中国語（41）「肉まんをお皿にのせてください」
programme.desc: 中国語に取り組む活動をする「チュウ活カフェ」で中国語を基礎から学びます。俳優・稲葉友と一緒に簡単な表現を読んだり、書いたり、話すことを目指すシリーズです。.(n)

programme.title: テレビ体操[字]

programme.title: にほんごであそぼ「福島のねぎそば」[字][デ]

programme.title: えいごであそぼ with Orton「“like”“cookie”であそぼ」[デ]

programme.title: デザインあ 5分版（574）

programme.title: ピタゴラスイッチ ミニ▽おてつだいロボ▽どっちが本物？[字]
programme.desc: 私たちがふだん暮らしている中に隠れている、さまざまな法則や不思議な構造、面白い考え方を、アニメ、歌、体操、ピタゴラ装置など多彩なコーナーで紹介します。.(n)

programme.title: コレナンデ商会「信号機」[字][デ]

programme.title: みいつけた！ 木曜日[字]

programme.desc: 2〜4歳児対象の教育エンターテインメント番組。歌・体操・人形劇・アニメなど楽しいコーナーがいっぱい！.(n)

programme.title: パッコロリン「みんな はなまる」[字]

programme.title: いないいないばあっ！ 木曜日[字]

programme.title: オトッペ「ネタ切れ？モフ先生」
programme.desc: 音から生まれた不思議な生きもの・オトッペと世界一のDJを目指すシーナの大冒険。.(n)

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ ワーキングボーシーズ「工事現場」

programme.title: てれび絵本「ムッシーげきじょう」

programme.title: みんなのうた「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」「愛を着て」
programme.desc: 「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」うた：岡村靖幸／「愛を着て」うた：コレサワ.(n)

programme.title: オハ！よ〜いどん「いま、いちばん好きなこと」[字]

programme.title: おんがくの おもちゃばこ「がっきの おとあつめ」[字]

programme.title: まなブー！コンシェルジュ「プログラミングで、思考力が育つ！？」[字][再]
programme.desc: 2020年度、小学校で始まった「プログラミング教育」。どういった目的で導入され、具体的には何を学ぶのか？ 実際の授業を見ながら、ポイントをわかりやすく解説する。.(n)

programme.title: SEED なやみのタネ「お店、あけてもいいかな？」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: ある駄菓子屋さんの店主の「なやみのタネ」。それは、新型コロナウイルスの感染が続く中、お店を開けてもいいのかどうか。あなただったら、どんな答えを出しますか？.(n)

programme.title: おはなしのくに「幸福の王子」[解][字]
programme.desc: 古川雄大がひとり芝居で演じる「幸福の王子」。困っている人を助けたいと願う王子が、力を貸してほしいと頼んだのは独りよがりのツバメ。「一度だけなら」と応じるが….(n)

programme.title: エイゴビート2（23）[解]
programme.desc: リズムに乗って体を動かし、楽しく英語を身につけよう！英語ビギナーのキッズが、習ったキーフレーズを引っさげて外国人との会話に挑戦。小学3、4年向け。出演・すみれ.(n)

programme.title: 基礎英語0 〜世界エイゴミッション〜（46）[解]

programme.title: もっと伝わる！即レス英会話 Lesson（95）
programme.desc: 英語で話しかけられた時、とっさに応対できますか？ 簡単な英語で「即レス」できるよう、スタジオの出演者が画面の前のあなたを徹底的にコーチします！.(n)

programme.title: ららら♪クラシック「歌曲王のピアノ曲 シューベルトの幻想曲“さすらい人”」[字][再]
programme.desc: 歌曲王シューベルトの“ピアノ曲”の魅力。▽シューベルトは“舞曲王”とも呼ばれるヒットメーカーだった！？▽ピアノ作品・幻想曲「さすらい人」の革新性に迫る！.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 親と子のメンタルケア（4）「親のセルフケア編」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: 美の壺・選「うぐいす」[字]
programme.desc: 警戒心が強いといわれる「うぐいす」の撮影に大成功！美しい鳴き声はもちろん、愛らしいしぐさまでたっぷりご紹介！日本の暮らしと文化に根ざしたうぐいすの魅力に迫る！.(n)

programme.title: すてきにハンドメイド「丸模様でつなぐ ガーター編みのストール」[字]
programme.desc: 春のお出かけやプレゼントにぴったり！今回は、丸モチーフをつなげて作る「ガーター編みのストール」をご紹介します。皆さんもお好きな色で作って、一緒に楽しみましょう。.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン おうちでカフェ風 “映える”いちごレシピ8「いちごのサラダ」[字]
programme.desc: 旬を迎えたいちご。いちご菓子店店主でいちご研究家の渡部美佳さんに、バリエーション豊かな「いちごを味わい尽くすレシピ」を教えてもらう。第8回はサラダを中心に紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味の園芸 やさいの時間 もえのプランター菜園「お得に育てるブロッコリー」[字]
programme.desc: 花蕾（らい）を食べるブロッコリーは草丈50cmほどで葉も大きく広がり存在感十分。わき芽が多く出る品種を選べば側花蕾の収穫が長く続きお得。出演：山口もえ 深町貴子.(n)

programme.title: 趣味の園芸 京も一日陽だまり屋「花かんざし わっ軽〜」[字]
programme.desc: 長い茎に丸っこい花を咲かせ、まるでカンザシのような姿が魅力の「花かんざし」。客人が花かんざしをほめると、どこからともなく舞妓が現れ、花の魅力を教えてくれ…。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味の園芸「輝きのリーフプランツ 金銀銅」[字]

ABC Late News
programme.desc: End your day informed and fully up-to-date as ABC Late News brings you the best coverage of the day's events while tracking global developments as the day begins elsewhere around the globe.(n)

programme.title: Q+A Highlights
programme.desc: The show that puts you at the centre of the conversation. Join host Hamish Macdonald and a panel of punters, pollies and pundits to talk through the issues of the past seven days and set the agenda for the week to come.(n)

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: End your day informed and fully up-to-date as ABC Late News brings you the best coverage of the day's events while tracking global developments as the day begins elsewhere around the globe.(n)

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Ticky Fullerton takes a detailed look at the day's business and finance news, with the latest trends on international share and currency markets, pointing to what Australians can expect in the day ahead.(n)
The best analysis of local, national and international events from an Australian perspective. Hosted by Leigh Sales, with political commentary from 7.30 Political Editor Sabra Lane in Canberra.(n)

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The global source of news from Germany and Europe, covering the world of politics, the economy, culture and sport.(n)

programme.title: ABC News Overnight
programme.desc: Live across Australia, ABC News Overnight brings you the very latest news happening around the globe, plus a comprehensive roundup of the issues and events that affected Australians across the day.(n)

programme.title: The Drum
programme.desc: Analysis of the day's news in an engaging and entertaining way. Steve Cannane and Julia Baird lead a panel of journalists, political and social commentators in a lively, thought-provoking discussion. Join the conversation.(n)
The best analysis of local, national and international events from an Australian perspective. Hosted by Leigh Sales, with political commentary from 7.30 Political Editor Sabra Lane in Canberra.(n)

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: An hour of national and international news The World features reports from the ABC's network of international correspondents and offers a forum for extended news stories, interviews and insights from around the world. The program showcases the reach and quality of the ABC's Australian and international reporting.(n)

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The global source of news from Germany and Europe, covering the world of politics, the economy, culture and sport.(n)

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Ticky Fullerton takes a detailed look at the day's business and finance news, with the latest trends on international share and currency markets, pointing to what Australians can expect in the day ahead.(n)

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: A snapshot of what's going on in regional Australia with a look at the people, events and issues making news from coast to coast in the past seven days.(n)

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: Wake up to great conversations & all the information you need to start your day. Michael Rowland & Virginia Trioli are joined by Paul Kennedy with sport, Del Irani with finance & meteorologist Nate Byrne with the weather.(n)

programme.title: ABC News Mornings

programme.title: Aussie Inventions That Changed The World
programme.desc: The fires of war become the forges of Australian invention. William Scurry invented a decoy Drip Rifle to help Anzacs safely evacuate from Gallipoli. Alexander Worsfold built his all-terrain Transporter to hurry injured soldiers to field hospitals on the Western Front. Adelaide-born Howard Florey and his team developed the wonder drug Penicillin that was first deployed amongst infected allied soldiers during World War Two. And from Wollongong, Evelyn Owen's Sub Machine Gun out-performed its competitors and become known as 'the diggers' darling'.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth
programme.desc: Fans of the iconic Prisoner series which pushed boundaries over three decades ago and still today boasts a loyal following worldwide, will remember Bea Smith as gutsy and fearless, ruling Wentworth Correctional Centre with an iron fist. But who was Bea Smith before prison? How did a wife and mother from the suburbs become a top dog without rival? Wentworth is a dynamic, often confronting, drama series that begins with Bea's early days in prison. Set in the present day, it is a modern adaptation of Prisoner contemporising legendary characters and their stories for today's audience. This ten-part series takes the viewer inside to an uncompromising environment exploring the politics of women in a world without men, and how such a threatening experience both challenges and often changes those confined and working behind the razor wire.(n)

programme.title: Aussie Inventions That Changed The World
programme.desc: The push for smarter farming is at the core of Australia's tough agricultural history. Richard and Clarence Smith quarrelled over who was the true inventor, but their Stump Jump Plough improved the economic prospects of farmers working difficult terrain. Frederic Wolseley's Mechanical Shears eventually won over the shearers and transformed the wool industry. Lew Bandt designed the Ute for farmers needing a comfortable working vehicle, and Benjamin Dunkerley invented a fur-cutting machine that led to the iconic Akubra.(n)

programme.desc: "Ties that Bind" revolves around Allison McLean (Kelli Williams), a tough and experienced police detective, mother and wife in suburban Seattle. programme.title: The Mum Show
programme.desc: Being Mum - It's not for the faint hearted! The Mum Show takes an honest, grace filled, soul searching, light hearted look at being a mum in today's world. Each episode explores how we can raise sons and daughters of promise, who flourish in God's purposes - whilst dealing with their mood swings, school trips, friendship dramas, extended family, modern day pressures, modern day fears, bedtime routines - the list goes on!?Join Marina, Emma and Clare as they explore a biblical model of grace filled parenting and consider the unique mum-identity God has over every mums life.(n)

programme.title: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary
programme.desc: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is a reality TV series that documents the journey of Jeni and Sarah as they travel the USA from Michigan to Florida. They sample some great food, visit well known sites, and experience fun activities such as white water rafting and indoor skydiving. Most importantly, they meet a host of extraordinary women, young and old, and talk about identity, purpose, relationships, beauty, choices, and much more. Throughout their travels, Jeni and Sarah will have fun, but they will always bring each episode back to one central theme: teaching young ladies about God's grace in their lives and addressing relevant issues in a redemptive way. Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is different than other youth-oriented reality TV for many reasons and will stand out as a positive, biblically-based alternative to many of the secular reality shows that depict today's youth in a negative light. It offers another option for reality TV fans that love the genre but are turned of.(n)

programme.title: Jesus: Son of God?
programme.desc: For centuries Christians have been declaring that Jesus is the Son of God. It's a bold statement - and one that bears questioning. When did all this begin? How could men and women, who believed in one God, think that God had a Son? What does 'Son of God' actually mean? Did Jesus himself have anything to say on the matter? Filmed in Turkey and the UK, Luke Waldock asks questions and presents answers to these searching questions. Jesus, Son of God? sets out on a journey to discover when, where and how this vital Christian belief originated.(n)

programme.title: Find Me
programme.desc: On what should be a day of celebration Senator McIntosh's son is kidnapped in an effort to end his opposition to a bill that would make it illegal to post any religious references in public or private. Meanwhile, Paul Jump and Jess Reagan stumble into the kidnapper's deadly game while out geocaching. Now they must find the Senator's son, while battling the choices of their past or they will become the kidnapper's next victims.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey

programme.title: The Way of the Master

The program delivers inspiring, insightful and thought-provoking interaction between dynamic co-hosts, captivating interviews with well-known guests, and colourful man-on-the-street witnessing encounters. Co-hosts, popular author Ray Comfort, Emeal ( "E.Z.") Zwayne, and Mark Spence, tackle some of the toughest questions about God, the Bible, and hot topics that skeptics and believers alike wrestle with, in a profound and often humorous way. Each episode will leave Christians better equipped to carry the good news out into the world, and sincere skeptics may find themselves doubting their doubts.(n)

programme.sub-title: Building a New Testament Church Pt2a
programme.desc: Why was the Bible written? David Pawson explores scripture and discovers some hidden gems. David Pawson has a BSc in Agriculture and an MA in Theology from Cambridge. He was a Chaplain in the RAF for three years and went on to become Pastor of two Baptist Churches (Gold Hill in Buckinghamshire and the Millmead Centre in Guildford) where he maintained a strong Bible teaching ministry. Released for a wider ministry in 1979, he has since spoken in numerous towns and cities in the British Isles and also extensively overseas. He is the author of a number of books including Truth To Tell, Leadership is Male and The Normal Christian Birth.(n)

programme.title: The Exchange
programme.desc: "Isn't it time to exchange your normal morning TV viewing for something fresh? Australia's new morning show The Exchange will explore every day issues with experts in their field on stuff that matters to you. Hosted by Rob and Christie Buckingham, the half hour talk show explores topics such as parenting, relationships, money, wellbeing, popular culture and social justice. The show also hits the streets to find out what the public think. Rob Buckingham has over 30 years experience in radio and TV and together with his wife Christie are senior ministers at Bayside Church in Cheltenham and Frankston. People are Rob and Christie's business. They have over 25 years experience working with and helping people through changing and challenging times. They have noticed, as life seems to be getting busier, finding the time to have a meaningful exchange can be more difficult. The program is all about giving people food for thought in areas that may affect them. The Show is ".(n)

programme.title: Everytown Downunder
programme.desc: Everytown Downunder is the mission trip of a lifetime! Travelling through the Aussie outback to coastal towns and Australia's biggest cities, Everytown Downunder has everything you'd expect from a trip around Australia - the outback, crocodiles, unique Aussie characters, Sydney Harbour and more. The series follows Australia's most travelled music evangelist, Steve Grace and his 28 person team on a 25,000km road trip performing 78 evangelical concerts, sharing their faith journeys and experiencing everything Australia has to offer. Along the way, they camp under the outback stars, swim with crocodiles at the top end, learn how to make an Aussie meat pie, and fulfil many life long dreams.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer, Enjoy Everyday Life
programme.desc: Religious programme.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: The Catholic Guy

Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruce's message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.(n)

Throughout their travels, Jeni and Sarah will have fun, but they will always bring each episode back to one central theme: teaching young ladies about God's grace in their lives and addressing relevant issues in a redemptive way. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the final leg of his journey between the cathedral cities of Norwich and Chichester, Michael Portillo discovers the history behind the extraordinary Pavilion at Brighton and learns that Queen Victoria was not an admirer of the Prince Regent's flamboyant taste. Michael finds that while above ground the railways brought day trippers to frolic in fashionable Brighton, underground, Victorian engineers built a magnificent network of sewers more than 40 miles in length, which are still functioning today. At Bramber, he discovers at the time of his guide tourists flocked to the town in huge numbers due to a Victorian museum of taxidermy. Michael's next stop is the impressive castle at Arundel and he's pleased to find that the Duke of Norfolk was a great supporter of the railways. His rail journey ends in Chichester from where he heads up into the South Downs for a taste of life in the fast lane at Goodwood.(n)

programme.title: Arming America's Teachers
programme.desc: In a remote training camp in Butler County, Ohio, we meet school teachers who are learning how to shoot, and if necessary, kill. This feature documentary explores the heated and divisive debate around how best to protect pupils, as schools prepare for gun attacks and school boards in America seriously consider arming their teachers. programme.title: Elizabeth I And Her Enemies
programme.desc: As Europe was being torn apart in a religious war, Elizabeth faced her greatest threat yet - Philip II of Spain, the Catholic king who built the Spanish armada, the most powerful military fleet in the world. After Philip's defeat, Elizabeth was adored by her subjects, but there remained one enemy she was powerless to defy - old age.(n)

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are Aus
programme.desc: Natalie Imbruglia has always taken pride in her father's Italian ancestry, but she knows very little regarding her mother's Australian heritage, dating back to the beginnings of the colony.(n)

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Follow Michael Portillo as he experiences the thrill of global rail travel, visiting locations recommended by his historic guidebook, and uncovering stories from the past.(n)

programme.title: Jeopardy

Test your word ingenuity and numerical ability along with two contestants who compete against each other for the chance to return the following day as champion. Joining Morecroft are newcomer and maths guru Lily Serna and wordsmith David Astle. (Commissioned by SBS, in English) G CC WS.(n)

programme.title: Mastermind Australia
programme.desc: With highly respected TV host, journalist, and self-confessed quiz junkie Jennifer Byrne at the helm, this program places contenders in the iconic Mastermind chair and gives them 90 tense seconds to answer as many questions as possible on their chosen specialist subject.(n)

programme.title: Michael Mosley: What's My Diagnosis

While delivering intel in the Russian sector for Engelmacher, Karin saves Marianne's life when they are pursued by Russian soldiers but Marianne is left badly injured.(n)

programme.title: Sbs World News Late
programme.desc: Up-to-date reports and analysis of the major national and international news stories of the day in Australia's only world news service. (An SBS Production).(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours In Police Custody
programme.desc: The covert team try to find the true identity of Jaguar Palace as well as the evidence to link the suspect directly to the drug-importing conspiracy. The detectives begin a nerve-shredding wait for the criminal network to set up its lucrative operation again and stand ready to strike against the ringleaders when it does.(n)

programme.title: Thick Lashes Of Lauri Mantyvaara
programme.desc: Best friends Satu and Heidi preach that real love is not for sale as they go around sabotaging posh weddings in the Finnish archipelago. But when Heidi falls head over heels in love with the ice hockey rising star Lauri Mantyvaara, Satu is left alone with their plans. Love, friendship and revolution are put to the final test as Satu is forced to decide what she really wants. And whether she dares to go for it.(n)

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Four-year-old Desi learns to accept the death of her father by sending him a letter on a balloon to which she receives a reply. Stars Ellen Burstyn.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Having narrowly averted a major disaster on an oil rig, the Thunderbirds have just returned home to their secret base when TB5, their space based station, is critically damaged in a suspected meteor strike. Unbeknown to them, the attack on TB5 is a deliberate ploy by international master criminal Aristotle Spode to get them off the island. He takes over the island and forces Brains into submission, using the power of his mind. But Spode has overlooked one key factor: Alan, Fermat and Tin Tin are still on the island.(n)

programme.title: Tom Thumb
programme.desc: The adventures of a boy the size of a thumb, who is taken in by a kindly couple.(n)

programme.title: The Ash Lad
programme.desc: Espen, 'Ash Lad', a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save a princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King.(n)

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: The world's favourite Collie joins an embattled city family on their way to a fresh start in the country and proves to be their saviour.(n)

programme.title: Belle And Sebastian 3
programme.desc: Sebastian tries to protect his beloved dog Belle from her previous owner.(n)

programme.title: From Up on Poppy Hill
programme.desc: Set in Yokohama in 1963, this lovingly hand-drawn film centers on Umi (voiced by Sarah Bolger) and Shun (voiced by Anton Yelchin) and the budding romance that develops as they join forces to save their high school's ramshackle clubhouse from demolition. The top-grossing Japanese film of 2011 and winner of the Japan Academy Prize for Animation, From Up on Poppy Hill captures the innocence of new love as well as the beauty of Yokohama's harbor and lush surroundings.(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: An epic adventure set in the last Ice Age, 20,000 years ago. While on his first hunt, an initiation to his tribe's most elite group, a young man is injured and left for dead after a bison hunt goes horribly wrong. Awaking to find himself broken, alone, and miles from his village - he must learn to survive and navigate the harsh and unforgiving wilderness. Reluctantly taming a lone wolf abandoned by its pack, the pair learn to rely on each other to hunt and become unlikely allies, enduring countless dangers and overwhelming odds in order to find their way home before the deadly winter arrives.(n)

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young tech worker takes a job at a powerful internet corporation. She soon comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Further Adventures, The. Holmes and Watson's new careers as consultants for Scotland Yard in London take them inside the tabloid journalism industry when a model is the victim of an acid attack.(n)

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: Calvary's father James is a good priest who is faced with sinister and troubling circumstances brought about by a mysterious member of his parish. Although he continues to comfort his own fragile daughter and reach out to help members of his church with their various scurrilously moral and often comical problems, he feels sinister and troubling forces closing in, and begins to wonder if he will have the courage to face his own personal calvary.(n)

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Four-year-old Desi learns to accept the death of her father by sending him a letter on a balloon to which she receives a reply. Stars Ellen Burstyn.(n)

programme.title: Someone Else's Happiness
programme.desc: When a child is killed in a hit and run accident, his small community is in a state of shock. As the hunt for the child's killer continues, tension in the town rises, gossip reigns, and the boy's death becomes a catalyst, or an excuse for settling old scores or renewing long buried resentments. Directed by Fien Troch, and stars Ina Geerts and Johanna ter Steege.(n)

programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.(n)

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: A hardened young murderess faces execution for her crimes but is offered a reprieve if she joins an organization of high-level assassins.(n)

programme.title: Song of Granite
programme.desc: The life story of traditional sean-nos singer Joe Heaney, from County Galway, Ireland. This film revolves around the life of the great traditional Irish singer, Joe Heaney. The harsh landscape combined with the myths, fables and songs of his Connemara childhood helped shape this complex and fascinating character. Enigmatic and complex, Heaney's devotion to his art came at a huge personal cost. By the time of his death in Seattle in May 1984, he was widely recognised as one of the most important figures in Irish traditional music, having won fans and admirers from every part of the globe and, most particularly, from the folk music scene in the United States.(n)

programme.title: The Shadow of Violence
programme.desc: Douglas 'Arm' Armstrong has become the feared enforcer for the drug-dealing Devers family, while also trying to be a good father. Torn between these two families, Arm's loyalties are tested when he is asked to kill for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Further Adventures, The. Holmes and Watson's new careers as consultants for Scotland Yard in London take them inside the tabloid journalism industry when a model is the victim of an acid attack.(n)

programme.title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
programme.desc: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight. She has her own tattoo shop and he plays the banjo in a bluegrass band. They bond over their shared enthusiasm for American music and culture and dive headfirst into a sweeping romance that plays out on and off stage but when an unexpected tragedy hits their new family, everything they know and love is tested. An intensely moving portrait of a relationship from beginning to end, propelled by a soundtrack of foot-stomping bluegrass, this film is a romantic melodrama of the highest order.(n)

programme.title: The Drummer And The Keeper
programme.desc: Gabriel is a chaotic young rock drummer desperate to hide his recent Bipolar diagnosis from his increasingly exasperated band mates Pearse and Toss. At the therapeutic mixed ability football game he's obliged to attend as part of his treatment, Gabriel is spectacularly upended by goalkeeper Christopher, a 17-year-old, with Aspergers Syndrome.(n)

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: Based on the 2009 investigative book by BBC correspondent Martin Sixsmith, The Lost Child of Philomena Lee, this film focuses on the efforts of Philomena Lee, mother to a boy conceived out of wedlock - something her Irish-Catholic community didn't have the highest opinion of - and given away for adoption in the United States. In following church doctrine, she was forced to sign a contract that wouldn't allow for any sort of inquiry into the son's whereabouts. After starting a family years later in England and, for the most part, moving on with her life, Lee meets Sixsmith, a BBC reporter with whom she decides to discover her long-lost son.(n)

programme.desc: This beautiful coastal region stretches from the Northern NSW border down to Byron Bay, and Paul is visiting to discover the Finger Lime citrus fruit and a tea plantation. Plus, there's plenty of local fish just waiting to be caught.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul starts his trip through the Peninsula at Portarlington, which is famous for its mussels. On the waterfront, he meets up with the guys from Sea Bounty who invite him out to help harvest shellfish. On his return, Paul takes his catch over to the Ol' Duke restaurant where he shows us some simple ways to cook shellfish.(n)

programme.title: Taste The Nation With Padma Lakshmi
programme.desc: El Paso was once part of Mexico. Its border location defines the region's identity and the complexity of America's political landscape. Padma Lakshmi eats her way through this border city while discovering the origins of one of America's most beloved cuisines. Padma cooks with Emiliano Marentes - the first generation Mexican American owner of the modern Elemi.(n)

programme.title: Tales From River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh reminisces about the early days at River Cottage, and offers advice to would-be smallholders on how to find their rural escape hatch and get started on the good life.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When Adam, owner of Via Brasil in Las Vegas, is concerned that meat sales aren't being reflected in his register, he calls Charles Stiles for help. When the Mystery Diners go undercover, they discover the manager is doing a lot more than just giving away free steak.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When Stephanie and D-Rock, owners of Cheeseburger Baby in Miami, Florida, notice a discrepancy in their register, they suspect an ex-convict employee is stealing from them. Charles Stiles sends in Mystery Diners Tracy and John to find out who's really responsible.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: Donal visits Mary O'Rourke who taught English before she became a politician. She used Theodora's columns in the Irish Times as a teaching aid, believing that the stories and use of language would improve her own students' English. She talks about this to Donal, reads a couple of extracts from the paper, and discusses the food she ate growing up in Athlone.(n)

programme.desc: Matt and Michael cook a one-pan wonder - a delicious Jambalaya, while Courtney cooks a great meat-free-Monday dish with her egg and tomato curry.(n)

programme.desc: Lidia travels to Ligoria - a region all about flowers, herbs, and lot's of vegetables. Then, Lidia's grandson Lorenzo, helps to make a pasta with string beans and potato in a fresh pesto sauce. And to finish off the meal, Lidia and Lorenzo make a delicious cherry tart.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie takes us to the heart of Australia for the Alice Springs Desert Festival. Maggie was invited to the Festival to help judge one of its major events, the Wild food competition. Her experiences of the local foods became the inspiration behind this week's cooking, with both Maggie and Simon demonstrating different ways to cook the desert camel before enhancing cake and scones with the exotic coffee flavours of the wattle seed.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week we follow Simon as he travels to sunny North Queensland in search of Black Tiger Prawns. Passing through Townsville, he ends up at an ultra-modern prawn farm nestled right in the shadow of Hinchinbrook Island. Maggie doesn't have to travel far for her main ingredient; she uses vine leaves from her own Barossa vines to wrap fish for the barbecue.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: In the early 1960s, more people in Ireland were employed in domestic service (cooks, gardeners, maids) than there were teachers. Donal meets Patricia Quinn Murphy who started her working life as an assistant cook aged 16, in a large house in Wexford and learns about a recent but largely forgotten part of our social history. At Muckross Traditional Farms, Donal is shown how to make soda bread in a bastible and makes Gur Cake, a popular Dublin sweet bread.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt's back in his hometown of Noosa reminiscing about his childhood holidays, which inspire his first recipe - beer battered fish. Courtney prepares a chicken katsu curry, while Matt wraps things up with a classic Italian dessert - tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to Calabria - a region with beautiful beaches and rugged mountains. With the help of her son Joe, Lidia creates a baked Cavatapi in a tomato sauce with fresh provolone, as well as chicken Catanzaro - chicken with homemade stuffing. And to end the meal, Lidia and Joe make tasty almond biscotti.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: In this episode, a L.A food truck recipes to make at home, a beach food challenge, a fabulous fish recipe, and a fun way to cook with vegies.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, Miguel's delicious crayfish roll, tasty bbq ribs for a great bunch of volunteers, the great schnitzel challenge, and the latest buzz on where to find the best Aussie honey.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Our journey begins in Japan, the birthplace of instant noodles. When was instant noodles conceived and why do some people consider it the greatest invention Japan has given to the world in the 21st century? To answer these questions and more, our host Kai visits Nissin's CupNoodles Museum in Yokohama and speaks to Mr Yukitaka Tsutsui, the museum's director and close friend to instant noodles inventor Momofuku Ando.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul's journey starts an hours drive east of Queenstown, through rolling hills, to the towns of Cromwell and Alexandra. Tagged the adventure capital of the world, Otago covers the island's south-east corner.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul takes a 50 minute drive from the frenetic pace of Sydney and arrives in the Blue Mountains, where there's no choice but to chill out and relax. This is a world heritage environment, with the magnificent three sisters looking over towns full of historic buildings, a vibrant arts community and unique small businesses.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: In this week's episode Maggie and Simon cook up a few favourites. Simon masters a salty- sweet- sour balance with a vegetarian Phad Thai, while Maggie combines tender squid with capers and leek in a delicious spring salad. Vodka, a favourite beverage of Simon's then features in a jelly, and Maggie makes a creamy barley risotto using a favourite spring vegetable, asparagus.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon show us how to prepare excellent cocktail food for a stress-free party. They share their secrets about what to make ahead of time, and how to use shop-bought bases and toppings.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Food Safari explores a different take on Mediterranean cooking with the rustic delights of Maltese food. Chef Paul Camilleri (Restaurant Sojourn) goes through the essential ingredients, and then cooks his family recipe for the national dish of rabbit stew. Then it's time for the national snack food, pastizzi, and the national sandwich called Hobs Biz Zeit - tomato paste on crusty bread and topped with anchovies, capers and olive oil. Chef Louis Bigeni shows how the Maltese have modified recipes from their neighbours, taking pasta to a different level with a rich meat sauce and baked in pastry.(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry's Absolute Favourites
programme.desc: Mary draws on inspiration from some of her earliest and fondest memories from her childhood holidays and regular trips to the British seaside as she prepares seafood linguine and royal crab and cod fishcakes.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Fruits of the Sea
programme.desc: On a Poldark-grey morning, with the sea crashing against the rocks at Stepper Point, Rick goes fishing with young university student Harry Gilbey. Harry lives only to fish, so has a tendency to neglect his studies. But unusually for a fishing fanatic, he never eats the stuff. Rick is determined to convert him. So when Harry catches a bass, Rick grills it with a vanilla sauce. It smells divine, but will Harry succumb? Rick takes his family on the beach at low tide to put out long lines, something he has done since he was a child.The idea is to bait up lots of hooks and leave them to the incoming tide. With any luck, there should be lots of fish to be gathered up in the morning when the tide recedes. One of Britain's most popular fish is plaice, which Rick cooks in a special sauce, made with red wine, leeks and parma ham.The sound of his son's band, practising noisily in the background, inspires Rick to name the sauce after them - Pablo.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: In the early 1960s, more people in Ireland were employed in domestic service (cooks, gardeners, maids) than there were teachers. Donal meets Patricia Quinn Murphy who started her working life as an assistant cook aged 16, in a large house in Wexford and learns about a recent but largely forgotten part of our social history. At Muckross Traditional Farms, Donal is shown how to make soda bread in a bastible and makes Gur Cake, a popular Dublin sweet bread.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt's back in his hometown of Noosa reminiscing about his childhood holidays, which inspire his first recipe - beer battered fish. Courtney prepares a chicken katsu curry, while Matt wraps things up with a classic Italian dessert - tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to Calabria - a region with beautiful beaches and rugged mountains. With the help of her son Joe, Lidia creates a baked Cavatapi in a tomato sauce with fresh provolone, as well as chicken Catanzaro - chicken with homemade stuffing. And to end the meal, Lidia and Joe make tasty almond biscotti.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: In this episode, a L.A food truck recipes to make at home, a beach food challenge, a fabulous fish recipe, and a fun way to cook with vegies.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, Miguel's delicious crayfish roll, tasty bbq ribs for a great bunch of volunteers, the great schnitzel challenge, and the latest buzz on where to find the best Aussie honey.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Our journey begins in Japan, the birthplace of instant noodles. When was instant noodles conceived and why do some people consider it the greatest invention Japan has given to the world in the 21st century? To answer these questions and more, our host Kai visits Nissin's CupNoodles Museum in Yokohama and speaks to Mr Yukitaka Tsutsui, the museum's director and close friend to instant noodles inventor Momofuku Ando.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Food Safari explores a different take on Mediterranean cooking with the rustic delights of Maltese food. Chef Paul Camilleri (Restaurant Sojourn) goes through the essential ingredients, and then cooks his family recipe for the national dish of rabbit stew. Then it's time for the national snack food, pastizzi, and the national sandwich called Hobs Biz Zeit - tomato paste on crusty bread and topped with anchovies, capers and olive oil. Chef Louis Bigeni shows how the Maltese have modified recipes from their neighbours, taking pasta to a different level with a rich meat sauce and baked in pastry.(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry's Absolute Favourites
programme.desc: Mary draws on inspiration from some of her earliest and fondest memories from her childhood holidays and regular trips to the British seaside as she prepares seafood linguine and royal crab and cod fishcakes.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon show us how to prepare excellent cocktail food for a stress-free party. They share their secrets about what to make ahead of time, and how to use shop-bought bases and toppings.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero Feast
programme.desc: Donal visits three of Galway's finest artisan food producers - Connemara Salmon Smokehouse, Connemara Hill Lamb, and Cuinneog Buttermilk. He then prepares the first feast at the spectacularly located Lisdonagh House in Headford, Co Galway.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt is on location on the bank of the Noosa River, cooking a delicious prawn salad, while Michael cooks the perfect steak sandwich. Courtney cooks the perfect roast mushroom and couscous salad.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to the beautiful region of Sardegna where she makes two wonderful eggplant dishes, and a delicious prune cake for dessert. First Lidia creates a baked eggplant with onions, tomatoes and pecorino cheese. For the second dish, Lidia is joined by her son Joe, to help her create a baked eggplant with onions, capers, and olives. Joe also gives some suggestions of great Sardinian wine to go along with these magnificent dishes. And for dessert Lidia makes a sponge cake with prunes and red wine.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, farm fresh produce with real bite, Miguel puts his churros up against some tasty donuts, a seaside classic you can make at home, and an easy Mother's day treat that kids can manage - meatloaf with love.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Tropical Kitchen
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of tropical North Queensland, Miguel Maestre, chef and one of the stars from Boys Weekend charms his way through the hot northern tropics cooking with many of the region's exotic ingredients in breathtaking locations. He kicks things off with the freshest North Queensland seafood in a classic Sanish Fideua, followed by a cheeky Pineapple Mojito and a breathtaking coconut breakfast on the beach at sunrise.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Aroy Mak Mak! The Thais mean business when it comes to their instant noodles. On average, they spend 30% of their income on these packets of instant gratification. Chef McDang, Thailand's leading food expert and writer, invites Kai into his home and shares how instant noodles came to the land of a thousand smiles.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: A visit to the west coast of Australia throws up limitless possiblilities - from the historic port of Fremantle to the ulitmate getaway, Margaret River, Paul enjoys the world class wine and fabulous fresh produce of the Western Coast.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Buffalo, bush tucker, barramundi, bush limes and lemons. It's all on the menu! Paul travels to the top end where it's always warm and that brings the locals and tourists out in force to immerse themselves in the nightlife, local markets and restaurants.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon revisit a few of their favourite kitchen moments from the year. They look back on the eggs, pasta, and mouth-watering desserts on the menu.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Simon and Maggie stroll back into the kitchen for a new season to dish up a refreshing summer feast. Maggie uses delicious second flush raspberries to adorn a fail proof sponge while Simon works magic with a raspberry, lamb and pea combination. Simon then treats us to a saucy fish curry using fresh territory barramundi, while Maggie adds layers of sweet tang to her barra with a lemon confit.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Island Feast With Peter Kuruvita
programme.desc: Chef Peter Kuruvita finds an intriguing mix of excitement and relaxation on the island of Tanna in Vanuatu. This volcanic island is home to a steadfastly preserved traditional way of life and its chiefs grant Peter approval to cook atop the slopes of its active volcano, Mt Yasur. Emerging unscathed with a batch of fire-roasted seafood cakes, Peter helps prepare a traditional Melanesian feast and discovers the calming effects of the famous kava root.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: This series is a celebration of exquisite French cuisine in all its delicious complexity. Presented by Maeve O'Meara, the series follows renowned Sydney chef Guillaume Brahimi on a personal journey back to France, the country of his birth. Together, they visit many of France's top kitchens and track down the finest food and wine the country has to offer.(n)

programme.title: Hemsley + Hemsley: Healthy & Delicious
programme.sub-title: Hemsely & Hemsley: Healthy And Delicious Series 1 Ep 2
programme.desc: Jasmine and Melissa visit The Crystal Palace Market to collect ingredients for a feast made up of huevos rancheros and a chocolate molten pot with figs and mango cashew cream.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Cosmopolitan Cook
programme.desc: Rachel journeys to the Princes' Islands of Istanbul, a chain of small islands worlds away from the hustle and bustle of the city. An inspiring locale bursting with local culture, the islands are home to charming cafes and meandering streets. Back in London Rachel whips up her take on a traditional mezze, and for a sweet touch she bakes a beautiful Pistachio Yogurt Cake with Pomegranate marbling.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero Feast
programme.desc: In Howth, Donal goes fishing with next-door neighbour Joe, visits the Arun bakery and a nursery specialising in exotic tomatoes.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt's joined in the Cook's Pantry kitchen by Courtney who cooks saffron poached pears and dukkah. Michael makes the perfect midnight snack with his tasty Welsh rarebit, and Matt finishes things off with his coconut-poached chicken salad.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Witness a marriage of flavours as Lidia travels to the beautiful region of Basilicata, where she makes a traditional wedding soup full of flavours like escarole, fennel, and meatballs. And if you love fish, then you will love Lidia's fish soup comprised of monk fish and grouper in a simple garlic and wine broth. Lidia ends the meal by making spaghetti topped with baked cherry tomatoes. A meal everyone will love.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Tropical Kitchen
programme.desc: From Green Island, one of the oldest and most beautiful Islands in the Great Barrier Reef, Miguel reveals some simple steps to a stunning Tuna Carpaccio, serves up a tropical Asian canape and discovers some exotic tropical fruits for his delicious Sweet Fruit Wontons.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Tropical Kitchen
programme.desc: Miguel finds time to take a dip at the breathtaking Milla Milla Waterfalls before whipping up a fresh Asian salad that really packs a punch. Then for something a little sweet, a beautiful tropical tart with hardly any cooking time required.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Per capita, South Koreans consume the most instant noodles per year compared to the rest of the world. How did instant noodles become as synonymous as Kim chi in Seoul? What's the difference between red and white soup instant ramen? Why the national affinity to all things hot and spicy.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Tasmania is surrounded by some of the world's cleanest oceans. This week, Paul travels through North West Tasmania to discover more about the local cray fishing industry. CC.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul visits Mitch McRae of Buxton Trout Farm who was hit with the full force of the Black Saturday fire. Now he's rebuilt and is back in business. Also, Paul meets pork farmers in the picturesque Yarra Valley who started off farming their pigs as pets.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Simon's salt and pepper croc along with home made baklava and Maggie's honey pikelets.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie meets food legend Rick Stein and they discuss the gentle art of cooking fish. Back in the kitchen, Maggie works her magic on an impressive piece of farmed Kingfish while Simon is inspired to try out one of Rick's recipes, a mouth-watering fish pasty. Simon and Maggie also get cracking on some crab dishes, inspired by Simon's visit to Australia's first commercial mud crab farm, all the way up North in the Territory.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Plat Du Tour
programme.desc: Guillaume visits the western side of France where there are so many food delights to be discovered. The seafood from the Atlantic coast, heart warming fare from the Pyraneese, and finishing in the city of his apprenticeship - the heart of Haute Cuisine - Paris. Guillaume shares a delicious mussel recipe, traditional steak frites, a flavourful swordfish dish, and celebrates the Australian Granny Smith apple with his tarte tatin.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Southern Indian cooking is distinctly influenced by the abundance of fresh fruit and vegetables found in the region. Sarah Todd's love of Indian cuisine has led her to open up restaurants in Goa and Mumbai, documented on the SBS television series, My Restaurant in India. Sarah starts with vindaloo pork ribs topped with Goan bhel, before cooking a vegetarian dish of baked cauliflower with pineapple sansav. Diana finishes the theme with a traditional dessert called sweet appam, filled with carmelised banana - the perfect snack on a balmy afternoon.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: In Thailand, foraging for wild ingredients and living off what the land provides is a big part of the way people live. In Byron, Indigenous woman Arabella Douglas forages for native ingredients and supplies chefs such as Josh Lewis of Fleet Restaurant. After Josh cooks Palisa a dish using emu eggs, she heads to collect pipis with Arabella, and then partake in a sumptuous campfire cook up of local seafood.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Food Heroes
programme.desc: Rick and Chalky are in the Yorkshire Dales. At Leyburn market, they check out the local dairy produce and, after chatting to the stall-holders, Rick prepares a Yorkshire Curd Tart, a local variety of cheesecake.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After realising how hard it is to start a new restaurant, the husband and wife owners of N'awlins Cafe, in New Orleans, contact Charles Stiles for advice. programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Keith, the owner of Deanie's Seafood in New Orleans, is concerned that his manager is more focused on his amateur comedy career than managing the restaurant. programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie meets food legend Rick Stein and they discuss the gentle art of cooking fish. Back in the kitchen, Maggie works her magic on an impressive piece of farmed Kingfish while Simon is inspired to try out one of Rick's recipes, a mouth-watering fish pasty. programme.desc: M-C / AO Disaster strikes when a farmer is pierced in the chest by a large metal spike, and the team rush to a motorcyclist who is in a critical condition after a crash in the Lake District.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: M / AO Benny's previous career with the District Attorney's office comes into focus when Chunk, aims to get a new trial for a man he believes was wrongfully convicted of triple homicide.(n)

programme.title: Married... With Children
programme.desc: PG To get into 'NO MA'AM', Bud must get his picture taken with wrestler, King Kong Bundy. Guest Starring Michael Clarke Duncan.(n)

programme.title: The Late Show With Stephen Colbert
programme.desc: PG Join Stephen Colbert and his eclectic mix of guests for a satirical and comedic take on what's new and relevant in the worlds of politics, entertainment, business, music, technology and more.(n)

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess letters in mystery words and phrases to win money or prizes, all determined by a spin of The Wheel!(n)

programme.title: Jeopardy
programme.desc: This is fast paced general knowledge at its best! Jeopardy provides a test of literature, history, science, the arts, pop culture and more. Can you keep up?(n)

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: PG-C The guys discover a rare 1930s coupe at Buckey's one-man ranch. The numbers aren't in Mike's favor when Frank shows off his beautiful mind.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: PG Ray feels left out when his father and brother plan to fight in a Civil War re-enactment - so he enlists. However, due to a uniform shortage, he ends up on the opposing side.(n)

programme.title: Prime News - First At 5.30
programme.desc: Join the Prime News team first at 5.30pm, for all the day's top current events, sports news and to see how the weather is in your region.(n)

programme.title: ISPS Handa Premiership Highlights Show
programme.desc: Join us for a wrap up of all the goals and action from the latest round of New Zealand's premier national football competition.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: PG-L Jarrett literally drops a one-of-a-kind art piece while trying to take matters into his own hands. Marc shows his shipping thumb when he raises and hauls a massive Sculpture Garden.(n)

programme.title: The Crowd Goes Wild
programme.desc: PG Join the team for an alternative dose of sports news, delivering the best (and worst) sporting moments the only way they know how, with a little cheek!(n)

programme.title: How We Eat - With Simon Gault
programme.desc: Celebrity chef Simon Gault embarks on an expedition to the Greek Islands to learn about the Mediterranean diet and see how it compares to what we eat here in New Zealand. Pt 1 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Prime Rocks: ABBA: Super Troupe
programme.desc: PG-C Bursting onto the scene at the 1974 Eurovision song contest, ABBA took the world by storm. Follow ABBA's journey to stardom through archival interviews and performances from the band.(n)

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: M-LC / AO The queens help the residents of Farmington and Shiprock, New Mexico foster unity and open-mindedness. Nate is eager to make a deeper connection with his Navajo people.(n)

programme.title: The Late Show With Stephen Colbert
programme.desc: PG Join Stephen Colbert and his eclectic mix of guests for a satirical and comedic take on what's new and relevant in the worlds of politics, entertainment, business, music, technology and more.(n)

programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment based on a Pan-African view.(n)

programme.title: فتنة
Fitna
programme.desc: من خلال دراما بدوية تحكي قصة فارسة تُدعى فتنة، تقع في الحب مع شيخ العشيرة طارد، وصراع الاثنين للوصول بحبهما إلى بر الأمان.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)

programme.title: أمير الليل
Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: شاهد عيان
Shahid Eian
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث في إطار درامي، حول حياة ضابط شرطة ومحاولاته في البحث عن زوجته الصحفية ندى بعد اختفائها وأوهام الخاطفين له بأنها قُتلت.(n)

programme.title: فتنة
Fitna
programme.desc: من خلال دراما بدوية تحكي قصة فارسة تُدعى فتنة، تقع في الحب مع شيخ العشيرة طارد، وصراع الاثنين للوصول بحبهما إلى بر الأمان.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)

programme.title: شاهد عيان
Shahid Eian
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث في إطار درامي، حول حياة ضابط شرطة ومحاولاته في البحث عن زوجته الصحفية ندى بعد اختفائها وأوهام الخاطفين له بأنها قُتلت.(n)

programme.title: أمير الليل
Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: فتنة
Fitna
programme.desc: من خلال دراما بدوية تحكي قصة فارسة تُدعى فتنة، تقع في الحب مع شيخ العشيرة طارد، وصراع الاثنين للوصول بحبهما إلى بر الأمان.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)

Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: العراب: نادي الشرق
Al-Arraab: Nady Al-Sharq
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث حول زعيم عائلة (آل منذر) الخطيرة والثرية ، والملقب بـ(أبو عليا) ، بعد أن يعقد (أبو عليا) اجتماعا مع (عمران) رجل الأعمال الثري والخطير، والذي يطلب انضمامه إليه في استثمار ضخم ، يرفض (أبو عليا) ؛ لأنه يدرك أن الحقيقة وراء هذه الصفقة هي سلبه نفوذه وزعامته ، مما ينتج عنه تفاقم الأحداث بين عائلة (أبو عليا) ، وبين الجميع.(n)

programme.title: رصيف الغرباء
Raseef El-Ghoraba'
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل في أول ست حلقات في العام 1945، أما الباقية فهي بين 1965 و1970، وتشمل أكثر من قصة تتناول أغلبها قالب يبرز العادات والتقاليد اللبنانية المستوحاة من واقع المجتمع، وصراع العائلات على النفوذ والسلطة.(n)

programme.title: أضواء وهمية
programme.desc: يتناول العمل قصة نسرين والتي ضاقت بها الحياة، وعندما تتعرض هي وشقيقتها لحادث سير، تقرر نسرين انتحال شخصية شقيقتها، فتكتشف أن زوج اختها ما هو إلا شخص يستغل زوجته في مجال الموضة.(n)

programme.title: من كل قلبي
programme.desc: لارا ويمنى شقيقتان تعيشان مع والدتهما بعد وفاة والدهما، تغرم لارا بشاب وتكتشف لاحقًا أنه متزوج فتعيش صراع مرير لكونها الخيار الثاني في حياته وتقرر الإنفصال عنه، أما يمنى طالبة سنة خامسة طب فتغرم بصديقها الذي يقلب حياتها رأسًا على عقب بسبب غيرته المرضية وتقرر أيضاً الإبتعاد عنه.(n)

programme.title: من كل قلبي
programme.desc: لارا ويمنى شقيقتان تعيشان مع والدتهما بعد وفاة والدهما، تغرم لارا بشاب وتكتشف لاحقًا أنه متزوج فتعيش صراع مرير لكونها الخيار الثاني في حياته وتقرر الإنفصال عنه، أما يمنى طالبة سنة خامسة طب فتغرم بصديقها الذي يقلب حياتها رأسًا على عقب بسبب غيرته المرضية وتقرر أيضاً الإبتعاد عنه.(n)

programme.title: عيلة ع فرد ميلة
Eaylat a Fard Mayla
programme.desc: يدور المسلسل حول تصوير واقع زوج مضطر لتحمل الأمرّين من زوجته المتطلبة ومن أولاده وجاره، في قالب كوميدي يعتمد على الأداء المبالغ به، الذي يبدو كأنه يخاطب الصغار على طريقة مسرح الطفل.(n)

programme.title: نهاركم سعيد
programme.desc: برنامج صباحي يومي، يهتم بمناقشة آخر المستجدات على الساحة السياسية، من خلال إستضافة المحليين السياسيين، لمناقشة القضايا التي تهم الرأي العام في لبنان. كان البرنامج عند انطلاقته بعام 1996 يتناول الأحداث السياسية بفقرة صغيرة مدتها نصف ساعة وبقية فترة البرنامج كانت حول أمور ثقافية ومنوعة.(n)

programme.title: فارس الاحلام
Faris al'ahlam
programme.desc: عمر صادق مخرج سينمائي يرفض العمل في التلفزيون، ويظل يتطلع إلى العمل بالسينما. ولكن تضطره ظروف مرض ابنته الوحيدة للرضوخ لمتطلبات الحياة والموافقة على تنفيذ الدراما التلفزيونيّة في سبيل تأمين تكاليف علاجها.(n)

programme.title: قلبي دق
Qalby Daq
programme.desc: مجموعة أفكار من واقع المجتمع اللبناني ، حيث لا زالت بعض العائلات اللبنانيّة مع فكرة إعطاء الإرث للشباب فقط ؛ لكون البنت ستتزوّج وتصبح على اسم رجل آخر كما يعتقدون ، ومن خلال قصة حب بين (سامي) الأرستقراطي ، و(كريستين) الريفية تتم معالجة قضيّة التمييز ضدّ المرأة ، وطرح فكرة كيف أنّ البنات هنّ اللاتي يقفن بجانب أهلهنّ ، وغيرها من القضايا المجتمعية في السياق.(n)

programme.title: العراب: تحت الحزام
Al-Arrab: Taht Al-Hezam
programme.desc: بعد رحيل أبو عاليا كبير العائلة، يأتي اﻵن الدور على ابنيه قيصر وجاد كي يديرا إمبراطوريته الاقتصادية رغم اختلاف نظرتهما لميراث العائلة، حيث يحاول قيصر الحفاظ على النهج القديم، بينما يحاول جاد انتهاج طريق جديد.(n)

programme.title: فارس الاحلام
Faris al'ahlam
programme.desc: عمر صادق مخرج سينمائي يرفض العمل في التلفزيون، ويظل يتطلع إلى العمل بالسينما. ولكن تضطره ظروف مرض ابنته الوحيدة للرضوخ لمتطلبات الحياة والموافقة على تنفيذ الدراما التلفزيونيّة في سبيل تأمين تكاليف علاجها.(n)

programme.title: Broken Pieces S1 (Paramparça)

programme.desc: Broken Pieces S1 (Paramparça). (2014).(n)

programme.title: رصيف الغرباء
Raseef El-Ghoraba'
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل في أول ست حلقات في العام 1945، أما الباقية فهي بين 1965 و1970، وتشمل أكثر من قصة تتناول أغلبها قالب يبرز العادات والتقاليد اللبنانية المستوحاة من واقع المجتمع، وصراع العائلات على النفوذ والسلطة.(n)

programme.title: لهون وبس
Le Hon W Bs
programme.desc: برنامج كوميدي، ينتقد الاوضاع السياسية والاجتماعية بشكل ساخر، ويستضيف شخصية عامة في كل حلقة من حلقات البرنامج، ويتحدث معها حول موضوع الحلقة، وغيرها من القضايا المطروحة.(n)

programme.title: العراب: نادي الشرق
Al-Arraab: Nady Al-Sharq
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث حول زعيم عائلة (آل منذر) الخطيرة والثرية ، والملقب بـ(أبو عليا) ، بعد أن يعقد (أبو عليا) اجتماعا مع (عمران) رجل الأعمال الثري والخطير، والذي يطلب انضمامه إليه في استثمار ضخم ، يرفض (أبو عليا) ؛ لأنه يدرك أن الحقيقة وراء هذه الصفقة هي سلبه نفوذه وزعامته ، مما ينتج عنه تفاقم الأحداث بين عائلة (أبو عليا) ، وبين الجميع.(n)

programme.title: رصيف الغرباء
Raseef El-Ghoraba'
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل في أول ست حلقات في العام 1945، أما الباقية فهي بين 1965 و1970، وتشمل أكثر من قصة تتناول أغلبها قالب يبرز العادات والتقاليد اللبنانية المستوحاة من واقع المجتمع، وصراع العائلات على النفوذ والسلطة.(n)

programme.title: لهون وبس
Le Hon W Bs
programme.desc: برنامج كوميدي، ينتقد الاوضاع السياسية والاجتماعية بشكل ساخر، ويستضيف شخصية عامة في كل حلقة من حلقات البرنامج، ويتحدث معها حول موضوع الحلقة، وغيرها من القضايا المطروحة.(n)

programme.title: أضواء وهمية
programme.desc: يتناول العمل قصة نسرين والتي ضاقت بها الحياة، وعندما تتعرض هي وشقيقتها لحادث سير، تقرر نسرين انتحال شخصية شقيقتها، فتكتشف أن زوج اختها ما هو إلا شخص يستغل زوجته في مجال الموضة.(n)
